actions.text: Amendment SA 1380 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

Amendment SA 1380 proposed by Senator Byrd for Senator Feingold. (consideration:  CR S9871; text:  CR S9871) To require the Comptroller General to conduct a review and to report to Congress on all of the data-mining programs relating to law enforcement and terrorism currently under development and in use in the Department of Homeland Security.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1380 proposed by Senator Byrd for Senator Feingold.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1380 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

purpose: To require the Comptroller General to conduct a review and to report to Congress on all of the data-mining programs relating to law enforcement and terrorism currently under development and in use in the Department of Homeland Security.
